mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.user_email, u.user_name, u.user_gender, u.user_phone, u.user_profile_image, u.user_created_at, u.user_updated_at, u.user_status, g.group_id AS group_group_id, g.user_id AS group_user_id, g.generation_id AS group_generation_id, g.group_code AS group_group_code FROM soma.soma_user u LEFT OUTER JOIN soma.soma_group g ON u.user_id = g.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY u.user_id DESC
